Title:
Assessing Refactoring Instances and the Maintainability Benefits
of Them from Version Archives
UseOF-SZZ: to know when defects were introduced to the software and when defects were fixed
Summary:
propose an approach to assess instances of refactoring that is one of the key processes for quality
improvement
Outcome:
(1)Defect density tends to decrease from the most refactored period. (2)Fix frequency tends to decrease after the refactoring frequency is high
through out the project.
